title: Definitions
context: ยง42F-101 Definitions. As used in this [chapter], unless the context clearly requires otherwise: &ldquo;Grant&rdquo; means an award of state funds by the legislature, by an appropriation to a specified recipient, to support the activities of the recipient and permit the community to benefit from those activities. &ldquo;Recipient&rdquo; means any organization or person receiving a grant. [L 1997, c 190, pt of ยง3; am L 2014, c 96, ยง5]
